B.F.A. Exhibition Identity

This identity was created on behalf of the 2010 fine arts exhibition for the graduating class of the University of Connecticut.

The logotype consists of a compilation of sketches taken from the seniors featured in the show. The sketches were individually printed on smaller sheets, hung, and distributed at the exhibition as souvenirs.

The letterforms themselves acted as canvases and were enlarged on individual posters to engage the audience at the opening night.
